chapter.title: Export &cephfs; via Samba
chapter.para: This section describes how to export &cephfs; via Samba share. Samba shares can be used with Windows* clients.

warning.title: Technology Preview
warning.para: As of &storage; 5, CIFS Export is considered a technology preview and is not supported.
